name: An Offer You Can't Refuse

flavorText: "I think you'll find my terms quite agreeable, if you know what's good for you."

name: Omniscience
originalText: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
flavorText: "The things I once imagined would be my greatest achievements were only the first steps toward a future I can only begin to fathom."\n—Jace Beleren

name: Run Away Together
originalText: Choose two target creatures controlled by different players. Return those creatures to their owners' hands.
flavorText: "Virtue is virtue, whatever the heart that nurtures it."\n—Malacan, Vantress exile

name: Self-Reflection
originalText: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.\nFlashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavorText: Some Echoes remember every moment of their past lives and spend their existence contemplating past choices.

name: Spectral Sailor
originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nFlying\n{3}{U}: Draw a card.
flavorText: "Any ship that sails on these mean seas for long is bound to pick up a ghost or two."\n—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Think Twice
originalText: Draw a card.\nFlashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavorText: "Either I know just the spell I need, or I'm about to."

name: Time Stop
originalText: End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities, including this spell. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage heals and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

name: Tolarian Terror
originalText: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.\nWard {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
flavorText: Afterward, a number of treatises on sea serpent morphology were swiftly revised.

name: Witness Protection
originalText: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature loses all abilities and is a green and white Citizen creature with base power and toughness 1/1 named Legitimate Businessperson. (It loses all other colors, card types, creature types, and names.)

name: Bake into a Pie
originalText: Destroy target creature. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")
flavorText: "My secret ingredient? Well, I can't tell you that. But here's a hint. It's not love."

name: Burglar Rat
originalText: When this creature enters, each opponent discards a card.
flavorText: "Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"\n—Izoni

name: Diregraf Ghoul
originalText: This creature enters tapped.
flavorText: "At least this one still has arms and legs. Well, most of its legs."\n—Enslow, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

name: Eaten Alive
originalText: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.\nExile target creature or planeswalker.
flavorText: "If you hear a groaning noise in the cellar, don't investigate. Don't split up. Just lock the door and barricade it."\n—Emili, guard captain

name: Exsanguinate
originalText: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavorText: "I didn't say I would help you find your way home. I said I would help you finish your adventure."

name: Fake Your Own Death
originalText: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control and you create a Treasure token." (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Hero's Downfall
originalText: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavorText: Odric resisted the vampire's curse with all his strength. But after a lifetime of fighting monsters, he was doomed to become one himself.

name: Liliana, Dreadhorde General
originalText:
Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card.
+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
−4: Each player sacrifices two creatures of their choice.
−9: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control of each permanent type and sacrifices the rest.

name: Macabre Waltz
originalText: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
flavorText: Liliana is never one to follow someone else's lead.

name: Marauding Blight-Priest
originalText: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavorText: "The vampires never had gods. We followed our bloodchiefs. Now they are gone. What is left? Destruction and death, my friends. That is enough."

name: Painful Quandary
originalText: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 5 life unless they discard a card.
flavorText: In Mishra's desperation to destroy his brother, he allowed Gix to destroy him instead.

name: Phyrexian Arena
originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavorText: A spark of resistance against a tide of corruption.

name: Pilfer
originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavorText: To the merchant, it was nothing more than a few missing trinkets. To Tinybones, it was the greatest heist of all time.

name: Reassembling Skeleton
originalText: {1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavorText: "If none of the bones are original, is it even the same skele—aaagh!"\n—Mort the Philosopher, last words

name: Rise of the Dark Realms
originalText: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.
flavorText: "For every living person there are generations of dead. Which realm would you rather rule?"\n—Liliana Vess

name: Rune-Scarred Demon
originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavorText: The litany of the infernal on his flesh pulses to the beating of his dark heart.

name: Stromkirk Bloodthief
originalText: At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target Vampire you control.
flavorText: Unlike Innistrad's more ostentatious vampire families, Stromkirk vampires take pride in silence and subterfuge.

name: Vampire Nighthawk
originalText: Flying\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)\nLifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

name: Zombify
originalText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavorText: "The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it."\n—Mystic elder

name: Abrade
originalText: Choose one —\n• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.\n• Destroy target artifact.
flavorText: The desert is a voracious beast, devouring both flesh and stone.

name: Axgard Cavalry
originalText: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavorText: Riding the goat\n—Dwarven expression meaning\n"a foolhardy act of bravery"

name: Brass's Bounty
originalText: For each land you control, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
flavorText: "Why squabble for trinkets when we could be living large off all this gold?"\n—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Brazen Scourge
originalText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavorText: Driven by an insatiable hunger, gremlins never cease feeding. They can destroy a lifetime of work in just a few moments.

name: Burst Lightning
originalText: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)\nBurst Lightning deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.

name: Drakuseth, Maw of Flames
originalText: Flying\nWhenever Drakuseth attacks, it deals 4 damage to any target and 3 damage to each of up to two other targets.
flavorText: "Spread out, you idiots! Spread out!"\n—Marsden, party leader, last words

name: Etali, Primal Storm
originalText: Whenever Etali attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.
flavorText: The storm rages and the earth breaks.

name: Fanatical Firebrand
originalText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)\n{T}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals 1 damage to any target.
flavorText: "The Brazen Coalition is a firecannon pointed at our enemies. Goblins like him are the spark to its powder."\n—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Firebrand Archer
originalText: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavorText: A word of vengeance, and her arrows awaken in flame.

name: Firespitter Whelp
originalText: Flying\nWhenever you cast a noncreature or Dragon spell, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavorText: In subsequent terms, first-year students were prohibited from enrolling in Introduction to Dragonkeeping.

name: Flamewake Phoenix
originalText: Flying, haste\nThis creature attacks each combat if able.\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may pay {R}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Frenzied Goblin
originalText: Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
flavorText: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

name: Goblin Surprise
originalText: Choose one —\n• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.\n• Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavorText: "Hey, your door's broken!"

name: Heartfire Immolator
originalText: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)\n{R}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker.
flavorText: "I'd rather go out in a blaze of glory than fade away and be forgotten."

name: Hidetsugu's Second Rite
originalText: If target player has exactly 10 life, Hidetsugu's Second Rite deals 10 damage to that player.
flavorText: Once a mortal ogre, Hidetsugu devoured his demonic patron and transcended mortality in a fit of rage.

name: Involuntary Employment
originalText: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Krenko, Mob Boss
originalText: {T}: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens, where X is the number of Goblins you control.
flavorText: "Threats? Extortion? Good sir, you have me all wrong. I am a legitimate businessman; my colleagues and I are simply here to conduct legitimate business."

name: Seismic Rupture
originalText: Seismic Rupture deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.
flavorText: The raiding party advanced on the lone figure, confident they had her cornered and helpless. Then she raised her hands, and the ground opened with a fiery roar.

name: Shivan Dragon
originalText: Flying\n{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

name: Slagstorm
originalText: Choose one —\n• Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each creature.\n• Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each player.
flavorText: "As long as we have the will to fight, we are never without weapons."\n—Koth of the Hammer

name: Spitfire Lagac
originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavorText: "If you hear a choking sort of cough, it's about to get really hot."\n—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Sure Strike
originalText: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavorText: "Everyone has a weak spot."

name: Thrill of Possibility
originalText: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.\nDraw two cards.
flavorText: "Remember all the great heroes who were careful and never did anything risky? Me neither."\n—Syr Carah, the Bold

name: Affectionate Indrik
originalText: When this creature enters, you may have it fight target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavorText: The problem isn't the indrik's enthusiasm, it's Ravnica's lack of guardrails.

name: Bite Down
originalText: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
flavorText: "All the fancy spells and diabolical machines in the Multiverse are nothing compared to a good chomp."\n—Vivien Reid

name: Blanchwood Armor
originalText: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.
flavorText: Some armor is forged, some is forested.

name: Broken Wings
originalText: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
flavorText: "Serra guides our shots true. Also, I just tuned the cannons."\n—Tiana

name: Bushwhack
originalText: Choose one —\n• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.\n• Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Doubling Season
originalText: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.\nIf an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

name: Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
originalText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nOther Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.\nWhenever Dwynen attacks, you gain 1 life for each attacking Elf you control.

name: Dwynen's Elite
originalText: When this creature enters, if you control another Elf, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavorText: Call one, call them all.

name: Elvish Archdruid
originalText: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.\n{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.
flavorText: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.

name: Garruk's Uprising
originalText: When this enchantment enters, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.\nCreatures you control have trample. (Each of those creatures can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nWhenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater enters, draw a card.

name: Genesis Wave
originalText: Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of permanent cards with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
originalText: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.\nTrample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavorText: The earth walks, strongest of all.

name: Giant Growth
originalText: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Gnarlid Colony
originalText: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)\nIf this creature was kicked, it enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.\nEach creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Grow from the Ashes
originalText: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)\nSearch your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, instead search your library for two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Inspiring Call
originalText: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
flavorText: "They said we were weak, did they? Let's show them what happens when we fight as one!"

name: Llanowar Elves
originalText: {T}: Add {G}.
flavorText: The elves of the Llanowar forest have defended it for generations. It is their sacred duty to keep outside influences from corrupting their ancestral home.

name: Mild-Mannered Librarian
originalText: {3}{G}: This creature becomes a Werewolf. Put two +1/+1 counters on it and you draw a card. Activate only once.
flavorText: She had always believed in the transformative powers of great literature.

name: Nessian Hornbeetle
originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
flavorText: "The first rule of politics can be learned from a lowly hornbeetle: it is wise to cultivate powerful friends."\n—Pythamon, sage of Meletis

name: Overrun
originalText: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn. (Each of those creatures can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavorText: Nature doesn't walk.

name: Reclamation Sage
originalText: When this creature enters, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavorText: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."

name: Scavenging Ooze
originalText: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and you gain 1 life.
flavorText: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

name: Snakeskin Veil
originalText: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavorText: Most travelers panic when they stumble upon the skin of a giant rattlewurm. Landry saw it as a gift.

name: Vivien Reid
originalText: +1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.\n−3: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.\n−8: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have vigilance, trample, and indestructible."

name: Wary Thespian
originalText: When this creature enters or dies, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

name: Wildwood Scourge
originalText: This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.\nWhenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another non-Hydra creature you control, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

originalText: Flying\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavorText: "Even the most hardened armies are ill-equipped to defend against an onslaught from the sky."

originalText: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards.\nWhenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

name: Empyrean Eagle
originalText: Flying\nOther creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.
flavorText: All the birds of the skies are the spirit's brood, gathered for safety under its wings.

name: Good-Fortune Unicorn
originalText: Whenever another creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

originalText: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste. (They can attack and {T} this turn.)

originalText: During each of your turns, you may play a land and cast a permanent spell of each permanent type from your graveyard. (If a card has multiple permanent types, choose one as you play it.)

name: Progenitus
originalText: Protection from everything\nIf Progenitus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Progenitus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
flavorText: The Soul of the World has returned.

originalText: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)\nVigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)\nTrample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

originalText: When this creature enters, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

flavorText: Every warrior on Kaldheim aspires to a death so noble.

name: Youthful Valkyrie
originalText: Flying\nWhenever another Angel you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
flavorText: Helle soared joyfully through the icy dawn. After hearing one thousand tales of her ancestors, she'd finally taken her place among the honored host.

name: Archmage of Runes
originalText: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
flavorText: The giants of Kaldheim have over two hundred runes for "squish."

name: Curator of Destinies
originalText: This spell can't be countered.\nFlying\nWhen this creature enters, look at the top five cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

name: Drake Hatcher
originalText: Vigilance, prowess\nWhenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put that many incubation counters on it.\nRemove three incubation counters from this creature: Create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

name: High Fae Trickster
originalText: Flash\nFlying\nYou may cast spells as though they had flash.
flavorText: "You humans think even slower than you move. You don't realize you've already lost."

name: Homunculus Horde
originalText: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a token that's a copy of this creature.
flavorText: "To whoever left their homunculus experiment unattended: you will not be penalized if you come forward and tell us how to make it stop."\n—Laboratory notice

name: Kiora, the Rising Tide
originalText: When Kiora enters, draw two cards, then discard two cards.\nThreshold — Whenever Kiora attacks, if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may create Scion of the Deep, a legendary 8/8 blue Octopus creature token.

name: Lunar Insight
originalText: Draw a card for each different mana value among nonland permanents you control.
flavorText: "When wolves howl at the moon, I can't help but wonder: Does it answer? What secrets might it share when humans aren't listening?"\n—Elinor, philosopher

name: An Offer You Can't Refuse
originalText: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller creates two Treasure tokens.
flavorText: "I sincerely regret that your place of business burned itself down after you declined our protection."

name: Omniscience
originalText: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
flavorText: "Knowing everything reveals not answers, but in fact their profound absence."\n—Gadwick, the Wizened

name: Refute
originalText: Counter target spell. Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavorText: "What arrives uninvited, overstays its welcome, and is blown away with a single breath?"

name: Sphinx of Forgotten Lore
originalText: Flash\nFlying\nWhenever this creature attacks, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to that card's mana cost.

name: Think Twice
originalText: Draw a card.\nFlashback {2}{U}
flavorText: "Hmm... I'm of two minds about this."

name: Abyssal Harvester
originalText: {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard that was put there this turn. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a Nightmare in addition to its other types. Then exile all other Nightmare tokens you control.

name: Blasphemous Edict
originalText: You may pay {B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost if there are thirteen or more creatures on the battlefield.\nEach player sacrifices thirteen creatures of their choice.

name: Bloodthirsty Conqueror
originalText: Flying, deathtouch\nWhenever an opponent loses life, you gain that much life.
flavorText: "Your death will be neither quick nor painless. Agony makes blood so much sweeter."

name: Hero's Downfall
originalText: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavorText: Querana held the bridge for hours, her blade a shining blur that cleaved through rags and rotten flesh. But the horde kept coming.

name: High-Society Hunter
originalText: Flying\nWhenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.\nWhenever another nontoken creature dies, draw a card.
flavorText: She preys on Thraben's elites, known for their sophisticated taste.

name: Nine-Lives Familiar
originalText: This creature enters with eight revival counters on it if you cast it.\nWhen this creature dies, if it had a revival counter on it, return it to the battlefield with one fewer revival counter on it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavorText: Curiosity stopped keeping score.

name: Phyrexian Arena
originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavorText: The gladiatorial stadiums on New Phyrexia echo day and night with the sounds of grinding metal and tearing flesh.

name: Rise of the Dark Realms
originalText: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.
flavorText: The empire expanded hungrily, every bloody conquest seeding the ground with the corpses of all who resisted. One moonless night, the corpses rose to take back what was theirs.

name: Tinybones, Bauble Burglar
originalText: Whenever an opponent discards a card, exile it from their graveyard with a stash counter on it.\nDuring your turn, you may play cards you don't own with stash counters on them from exile, and mana of any type can be spent to cast those spells.\n{3}{B}, {T}: Each opponent discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Vengeful Bloodwitch
originalText: Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavorText: "Using blood to shed more blood— tell me that's not inspired!"

name: Zul Ashur, Lich Lord
originalText: Ward—\nPay 2 life.\n{T}: You may cast target Zombie creature card from your graveyard this turn.
flavorText: While her foes took stock of their casualties, she ordered hers to renew the assault.

name: Abrade
originalText: Choose one —\n• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.\n• Destroy target artifact.
flavorText: Selis entered the storm brimming with confidence. Her courage crumbled almost as fast as her shield.

name: Electroduplicate
originalText: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except it has haste and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this token."\nFlashback {2}{R}{R}
flavorText: "What's a more fitting shape for a storm than a dragon?"\n—Niv-Mizzet

name: Etali, Primal Storm
originalText: Whenever Etali attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.
flavorText: He is the roaring hurricane, the earthquake's sundering fury, the embodiment of wild, untamable power.

name: Kellan, Planar Trailblazer
originalText: {1}{R}: If Kellan is a Scout, it becomes a Human Faerie Detective and gains "Whenever Kellan deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn."\n{2}{R}: If Kellan is a Detective, it becomes a 3/2 Human Faerie Rogue and gains double strike.

name: Rite of the Dragoncaller
originalText: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavorText: They were summoned to usher in an age their summoner would never live to see.

name: Searslicer Goblin
originalText: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
flavorText: Among the akki, promotions are regularly earned through important criteria like "having the biggest weapon."

name: Twinflame Tyrant
originalText: Flying\nIf a source you control would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals double that damage instead.
flavorText: The two heads occasionally disagree on trivial matters like who to eat first.

name: Genesis Wave
originalText: Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of permanent cards with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
originalText: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.\nTrample
flavorText: She is the predator's appetite, the hunter's ferocity, the primordial progenitor of claws and fangs.

name: Loot, Exuberant Explorer
originalText: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.\n{4}{G}{G}, {T}: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control from among them and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.

name: Mossborn Hydra
originalText: Trample\nThis creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.\nLandfall — Whenever a land you control enters, double the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature.

name: Preposterous Proportions
originalText: Creatures you control get +10/+10 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavorText: "I think you mean giant lemures, a type of malevolent spirit that . . . OH GODS, WHAT IS THAT?!"\n—Uriah the Smug, last words

name: Quilled Greatwurm
originalText: Trample\nWhenever a creature you control deals combat damage during your turn, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.\nYou may cast this card from your graveyard by removing six counters from among creatures you control in addition to paying its other costs.

name: Reclamation Sage
originalText: When this creature enters, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavorText: "All matter returns to nature, in time. I just speed up the process a bit."

name: Spinner of Souls
originalText: Reach\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Sylvan Scavenging
originalText: At the beginning of your end step, choose one —\n• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.\n• Create a 3/3 green Raccoon creature token if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

name: Alesha, Who Laughs at Fate
originalText: First strike\nWhenever Alesha attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.\nRaid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, return target creature card with mana value less than or equal to Alesha's power from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Anthem of Champions
originalText: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavorText: "Our home may have no walls, but it is far from undefended."

name: Ashroot Animist
originalText: Trample\nWhen this creature attacks, another target creature you control gains trample and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is this creature's power.
flavorText: "The land is my steed, and I am its champion!"

originalText: Lifelink, hexproof from instants\nAs long as your life total is greater than your starting life total, Elenda gets +1/+1 and has menace. Elenda gets an additional +5/+5 as long as your life total is at least 10 greater than your starting life total.

originalText: Flying\nWhenever this creature attacks, you gain 2 life.

originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

originalText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\n{3}{W}{W}: Attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

originalText: Flying

originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

originalText: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

name: Pacifism
originalText: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block.

flavorText: "We do not make martyrs of villains. We leave them and their vile ideologies to be forgotten."\n—Lyra Dawnbringer

name: Twinblade Paladin
originalText: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.\nAs long as you have 25 or more life, this creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen this creature enters, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

name: Cancel
originalText: Counter target spell.
flavorText: "I decide what stands in my way."

name: Corsair Captain

flavorText: "Lungs full of sea air and a hold full of loot. Ah, what a life!"

name: Eaten by Piranhas
originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nEnchant creature\nEnchanted creature loses all abilities and is a black Skeleton creature with base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other colors, card types, and creature types.)

name: Exclusion Mage
originalText: When this creature enters, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
flavorText: Successful battles start with knowing who's worth fighting.

originalText: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)\nReturn target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

name: Kitesail Corsair
originalText: This creature has flying as long as it's attacking.
flavorText: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"

name: Mystic Archaeologist
originalText: {3}{U}{U}: Draw two cards.
flavorText: The delight of discovery drives the pursuit of knowledge.

name: Opt
originalText: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)\nDraw a card.

name: Quick Study
originalText: Draw two cards.

name: Starlight Snare
originalText: Enchant creature\nWhen this Aura enters, tap enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Storm Fleet Spy
originalText: Raid — When this creature enters, if you attacked this turn, draw a card.
flavorText: "They're searching in the same direction we are. And for the same thing, I'll wager."

name: Bloodtithe Collector
originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters, if an opponent lost life this turn, each opponent discards a card.
flavorText: For the more refined vampire, breaking a victim's will is far more satisfying than simply taking their blood.

name: Cemetery Recruitment
originalText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a Zombie card, draw a card.
flavorText: To a necromancer as powerful as Liliana Vess, a graveyard is as good as a garrison of soldiers awaiting her command.

name: Crossway Troublemakers
originalText: Attacking Vampires you control have deathtouch and lifelink. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it. originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Deadly Plot

name: Highborn Vampire
flavorText: With the bloodchiefs annihilated in the fight between the free and enthralled, the swamps around Malakir are full of dangerous, young vampires eager to make their marks.

name: Maalfeld Twins
originalText: When this creature dies, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

name: Moment of Craving
originalText: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

name: Offer Immortality
originalText: Target creature gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavorText: "Give all you are to Phyrexia, and you will receive more than you could have ever desired."

name: Skeleton Archer
originalText: When this creature enters, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavorText: "Soul, flesh, even eyes—none of these are strictly necessary for deadly precision."\n—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Suspicious Shambler
originalText: {4}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavorText: It was the perfect disguise—at least until its stomach started moaning.

name: Undying Malice
originalText: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it."
flavorText: Lazlo was going to find the jerks who stabbed him in the back and stab them in their fronts.

name: Untamed Hunger
originalText: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavorText: "Mindlessness is not weakness. When we are lost to hunger we are unstoppable."\n—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

name: Vampire Interloper
originalText: Flying\nThis creature can't block.

name: Vampire Neonate
originalText: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

name: Vampire Spawn
originalText: When this creature enters, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavorText: Unsuccessful vampire hunters often wind up as ravenous spawn.

name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: A few moments of her rattle's infuriating clattering is enough to provoke even lifelong pacifists into a howling, violent rage.

name: Carnelian Orb of Dragonkind
originalText: {T}: Add {R}. If that mana is spent on a Dragon creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn.
flavorText: Sages whisper that Lathliss still keeps the heart of the old dragon queen sealed within a jewel, its smoldering warmth an eternal reminder that no monarch is untouchable.

name: Dragon Fodder
originalText: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavorText: Gnorl and Vurg knew all too well how much dragons liked to eat goblins, but they had a dream that could not be dampened: they were going to be the first goblins to eat a dragon.

name: Dragonlord's Servant
originalText: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavorText: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

name: Dropkick Bomber
originalText: Other Goblins you control get +1/+1.\n{R}: Until end of turn, another target Goblin you control gains flying and "When this creature deals combat damage, sacrifice it."
flavorText: "I've always enjoyed kicking stuff, so this was an ideal career opportunity."

name: Fire Elemental
flavorText: "The best way to learn from a book on pyromancy is to burn it."\n—Jaya Ballard

name: Goblin Oriflamme
originalText: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavorText: "It was difficult to tell whether the piles of gore within their warrens were mere trash heaps, sacred altars, or warnings."\n—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV*

name: Goblin Smuggler
originalText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)\n{T}: Another target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavorText: "No one here but us empty barrels!"

name: Kargan Dragonrider
originalText: As long as you control a Dragon, this creature has flying.
flavorText: "Only those who give the dragons the respect they deserve may bear our title."

name: Kindled Fury
originalText: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavorText: "Fiends! Cowards! Your days of slaughtering innocents are done. It's time to face a real warrior!"

name: Raging Redcap
originalText: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavorText: Many tales of redcap terror begin with two simple things: bloodlust and stolen steel.

name: Rapacious Dragon
originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
flavorText: "Surely it won't notice if I take—"\n—Theria the Sly, last words

name: Scorching Dragonfire
originalText: Scorching Dragonfire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavorText: As the blaze raced toward her, Syr Ameril closed her eyes and pictured Castle Ardenvale so her last thoughts would be of home.

name: Seize the Spoils
originalText: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.\nDraw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
flavorText: Slibbo was tired of following Korvold's draconian library rules.

name: Skyraker Giant
originalText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavorText: She will not be content until hers is the highest head in the sky.

name: Swab Goblin
flavorText: Though small, goblins can hold their own in a fight. Foolhardy confidence goes a long way.

name: Terror of Mount Velus
originalText: Flying\nDouble strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)\nWhen this creature enters, creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.
flavorText: The forge of Purphoros burns in the heart of Mount Velus, attracting dragons with its blistering heat.

name: Volley Veteran
originalText: When this creature enters, it deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of Goblins you control.
flavorText: They didn't fire in unison, nor in the same direction. Most didn't even use arrows. Somehow it worked perfectly.

name: Aggressive Mammoth
originalText: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nOther creatures you control have trample.
flavorText: "Approach from behind. That way, if it does charge, at least you aren't in front of it."\n—Vivien Reid

name: Bear Cub
flavorText: Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it.\n—Elvish saying

name: Biogenic Upgrade
originalText: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.
flavorText: "Our state-of-the-art laboratories have been stripped of bothersome safety measures."\n—Radula, Simic biomancer

name: Druid of the Cowl
originalText: {T}: Add {G}.
flavorText: "The wild tangle of the Cowl provides sanctuary to life that watched the first buildings rise."

name: Joraga Invocation
originalText: Each creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.
flavorText: "A single tree does not a forest make. We are stronger when we stand together."\n—Numa, Joraga chieftain

name: Magnigoth Sentry
originalText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavorText: When one of Yavimaya's enormous magnigoth trees awakens into a treefolk, it is a towering presence of physical strength and ancient wisdom.

name: New Horizons
originalText: Enchant land\nWhen this Aura enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.\nEnchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

name: Tajuru Pathwarden
originalText: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)\nTrample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavorText: "My people blazed these pathways long ago, before the Eldrazi came. We will ride them long after the Eldrazi are gone."

name: Thornweald Archer
originalText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavorText: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.

name: Thrashing Brontodon
originalText: {1}, Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavorText: It cares more about preserving the herd's territory than about preserving itself.

name: Wildheart Invoker
originalText: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavorText: "Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."\n—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Goblin Firebomb
originalText: Flash\n{7}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Destroy target permanent.
flavorText: "And if this works, Tawnos is gonna let us build the full-sized version!"\n—Tergel, goblin explosioneer

name: Pirate's Cutlass
originalText: When this Equipment enters, attach it to target Pirate you control.\nEquipped creature gets +2/+1.\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Uncharted Haven
originalText: This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color.\n{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
flavorText: "There are lands beyond Valley. Wild, calamity-scarred, and beautiful."\n—Farfeather, birdfolk scout

name: Angelic Destiny
originalText: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +4/+4, has flying and first strike, and is an Angel in addition to its other types.\nWhen enchanted creature dies, return Angelic Destiny to its owner's hand.

name: Archway Angel
originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters, you gain 2 life for each Gate you control.
flavorText: A ray of hope breaks through the shroud of rain.

name: Ballyrush Banneret
originalText: Kithkin spells and Soldier spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavorText: Only wool from the side of the springjack turned most often to the sun can be woven into kithkin battle standards. Jackherds record every movement of their woolly-jacks until shearing.

name: Charming Prince
originalText:
When this creature enters, choose one —
• Scry 2.
• You gain 3 life.
• Exile another target creature you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Crusader of Odric
originalText: Crusader of Odric's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavorText: "We are Odric's sword. We strike without fear, for his mind has divined how our foe will be slain."

name: Dawnwing Marshal
originalText: Flying\n{4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavorText: "Horizon to horizon, mountain to sea. Everything within is ours to protect."

name: Devout Decree
originalText: Exile target creature or planeswalker that's black or red. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
flavorText: "It is not punishment. I am simply making things as they should be."\n—Sephara, Sky's Blade

name: Disenchant
originalText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavorText: Even millennia later, some war machines from the devastating Brothers' War continue to function. Thankfully, the weapons meant to destroy them still work too.

name: Felidar Cub
originalText: Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target enchantment.
flavorText: Felidars that make it through their first year of life can easily live to see a hundred years more.

name: Felidar Retreat
originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, choose one —\n• Create a 2/2 white Cat Beast creature token.\n• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.

name: Fumigate
originalText: Destroy all creatures. You gain 1 life for each creature destroyed this way.
flavorText: "Ghirapur's gremlin population poses a threat to the infrastructure of the fairgrounds. Threats must be eliminated."\n—Sram, senior edificer

name: Knight of Grace
originalText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nHexproof from black (This creature can't be the target of black spells or abilities your opponents control.)\nThis creature gets +1/+0 as long as any player controls a black permanent.
flavorText: A light to pierce the shadows.

name: Linden, the Steadfast Queen
originalText: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)\nWhenever a white creature you control attacks, you gain 1 life.
flavorText: "Until my last breath, I will defend the realm."

name: Mentor of the Meek
originalText: Whenever another creature you control with power 2 or less enters, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
flavorText: "In these halls there is no pass or fail. Your true test comes with the first full moon."

name: Regal Caracal
originalText: Other Cats you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink. (Damage dealt by those creatures also causes you to gain that much life.)\nWhen this creature enters, create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink.
flavorText: Oketra's closest viziers are known as her chosen, though others may have a better claim to that moniker.

name: Release the Dogs
originalText: Create four 1/1 white Dog creature tokens.
flavorText: They charge into battle and out for their morning walk with the same exuberance.

name: Stasis Snare
originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen this enchantment enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

name: Syr Alin, the Lion's Claw
originalText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nWhenever Syr Alin attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavorText: "The realm must never yield to the chaos of the wilds."

name: Valorous Stance
originalText: Choose one —\n• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)\n• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
flavorText: "Every choice alters the path of fate."\n—Sarkhan Vol

name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
originalText: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible
flavorText: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.

name: Arcanis the Omnipotent
originalText: {T}: Draw three cards.\n{2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis to its owner's hand.
flavorText: He has journeyed where none have been before. Now he returns to ensure that none follow.

name: Chart a Course
originalText: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.
flavorText: While other pirates prowl for treasure, Captain Parrish plunders secrets.

name: Dictate of Kruphix
originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nAt the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
flavorText: The god Kruphix was born when mortals first looked to the horizon and wondered what lay beyond.

name: Dive Down
originalText: Target creature you control gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavorText: "Seeing the river is not the same as seeing the fish."

name: Finale of Revelation
originalText: Draw X cards. If X is 10 or more, instead shuffle your graveyard into your library, draw X cards, untap up to five lands, and you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.\nExile Finale of Revelation.
flavorText: "Brother, your fate has always been bound to mine. Now we have reached the place where they shall both end."

name: Flashfreeze
originalText: Counter target red or green spell.
flavorText: "Your downfall was not your ignorance, your weakness, or your hubris, but your warm blood."\n—Heidar, Rimewind master

name: Fog Bank
originalText: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nFlying\nPrevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by this creature.
flavorText: The battalion thought they could escape the fog by marching in a straight line. Three days later, they began to suspect it was following them.

name: Gateway Sneak
originalText: Whenever a Gate you control enters, this creature can't be blocked this turn.\nWhenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavorText: "I've been through every guildgate in this city, and no one sees me come or go."

name: Harbinger of the Tides
originalText: You may cast this card as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen this creature enters, you may return target tapped creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

name: Mystical Teachings
originalText: Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.\nFlashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: River's Rebuke
originalText: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.
flavorText: The waters that give the River Herald merfolk their name are sacred to their culture; they do not abide invaders to sail upon them.

name: Shipwreck Dowser
originalText: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)\nWhen this creature enters, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText: Lost at sea doesn't have to mean lost forever.

name: Sphinx of the Final Word
originalText:
This spell can't be countered.
Flying
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Instant and sorcery spells you control can't be countered.

name: Tempest Djinn
originalText: Flying\nThis creature gets +1/+0 for each basic Island you control.
flavorText: "Oh, yes, many have come to take my power for their own. They will tell you all about their exploits when you meet them on the sea floor."

name: Unsummon
originalText: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavorText: Tolarian apprentices learn to liberate aetheric energy long before they are taught to bind it.

name: Voracious Greatshark
originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen this creature enters, counter target artifact or creature spell.
flavorText: There is no boat big enough.

name: Deathmark
originalText: Destroy target green or white creature.
flavorText: "I hope it's true that every snowflake is unique, because I never want to see one like this again. Now clean up that body."\n—Thangbrand Gyrdsson, Kjeldoran patrol

name: Demonic Pact
originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• This enchantment deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.
• Target opponent discards two cards.
• Draw two cards.
• You lose the game.

name: Desecration Demon
originalText: Flying\nAt the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature of their choice. If a player does, tap this creature and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Dread Summons
originalText: Each player mills X cards. For each creature card put into a graveyard this way, you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavorText: "Did you have a nice nap?"\n—Liliana Vess

name: Driver of the Dead
originalText: When this creature dies, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavorText: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

name: Duress
originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavorText: "Give of yourself, for *compleation* awaits the cleansed."\n—Nokar, priest of Sheoldred

name: Kalastria Highborn
originalText: Whenever this creature or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavorText: Each of Malakir's great families boasts a contingent of nulls appropriate to its rank in society.

name: Knight of Malice
originalText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nHexproof from white (This creature can't be the target of white spells or abilities your opponents control.)\nThis creature gets +1/+0 as long as any player controls a white permanent.
flavorText: A shadow to swallow the light.

name: Midnight Reaper
originalText: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, this creature deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.
flavorText: No one welcomes his visit, yet all must grant him tribute.

name: Myojin of Night's Reach
originalText: Myojin of Night's Reach enters with a divinity counter on it if you cast it from your hand.\nMyojin of Night's Reach has indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it.\nRemove a divinity counter from Myojin of Night's Reach: Each opponent discards their hand.

name: Nullpriest of Oblivion
originalText:
Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Lifelink
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When this creature enters, if it was kicked, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Pulse Tracker
originalText: Whenever this creature attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavorText: "You can't think your way out of this, Jace. Thought implies life, and life requires a pulse—music to a hunter's ears."\n—Vraska

name: Sanguine Indulgence
originalText: This spell costs {3} less to cast if you've gained 3 or more life this turn.\nReturn up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText: "Drink from the vein? How provincial."\n—Lord Duchorvin

name: Tribute to Hunger
originalText: Target opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavorText: "Secluded park. Dual puncture wounds. I told you these aren't random murders. Get the stakes ready.\n—Rem Karolus, monster slayer

name: Vampiric Rites
originalText: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavorText: Scions of the Markov line take particular pleasure in the perversion of humans' holy rituals.

name: Vile Entomber
originalText: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)\nWhen this creature enters, search your library for a card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.
flavorText: The dead are lonely in the crypt and always eager for company.

name: Wishclaw Talisman
originalText: This artifact enters with three wish counters on it.\n{1}, {T}, Remove a wish counter from this artifact: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. An opponent gains control of this artifact. Activate only during your turn.

name: Ball Lightning
originalText: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nHaste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)\nAt the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this creature.

name: Bolt Bend
originalText: This spell costs {3} less to cast if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.\nChange the target of target spell or ability with a single target.
flavorText: "Give them everything you've got . . . and some things you don't."\n—Ral Zarek

name: Crash Through
originalText: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (Each of those creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nDraw a card.
flavorText: "We have to get out of the city, Djeru. All of us! Gather as many as you can."\n—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Dragon Mage
originalText: Flying\nWhenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
flavorText: "Yes, it's huge and strong and breathes fire. But we're smart!"\n—Tadith the Wise, last words

name: Dragonmaster Outcast
originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavorText: "This world will be ruled by its rightful sovereigns, not these hideous pretenders."

name: Ghitu Lavarunner
originalText: As long as there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, this creature gets +1/+0 and has haste. (It can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavorText: Tolarians teach the theory of pyromancy. The Ghitu prefer applied research.

name: Giant Cindermaw
originalText: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nPlayers can't gain life.
flavorText: "Don't excavate too far into those canyons. I promised your parents I'd return you in one piece."\n—Tocasia

name: Harmless Offering
originalText: Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.
flavorText: "Such an adorable face!"

name: Hoarding Dragon
originalText: Flying\nWhen this creature enters, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle.\nWhen this creature dies, you may put the exiled card into its owner's hand.

name: Lathliss, Dragon Queen
originalText: Flying\nWhenever another nontoken Dragon you control enters, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.\n{1}{R}: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Mindsparker
originalText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nWhenever an opponent casts a white or blue instant or sorcery spell, this creature deals 2 damage to that player.

name: Obliterating Bolt
originalText: Obliterating Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavorText: In desperation, Pero called on his memory of a lightning storm that nearly killed his family. When he opened his eyes, only smoke and dust remained.

name: Ravenous Giant
originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to you.
flavorText: The might of an army with the restraint of a child.

name: Redcap Gutter-Dweller
originalText: Menace\nWhen this creature enters, create two 1/1 black Rat creature tokens with "This token can't block."\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

name: Stromkirk Noble
originalText: This creature can't be blocked by Humans.\nWhenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavorText: "A responsible king walks among his subjects."

name: Taurean Mauler
originalText: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)\nWhenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
flavorText: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

name: Viashino Pyromancer
originalText: When this creature enters, it deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavorText: "I trained with the Ghitu, and I respect the fire as they do."

name: Circuitous Route
originalText: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavorText: "The shortest path between two points is not always the safest."\n—Tamina, district guide

name: Fierce Empath
originalText: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Fynn, the Fangbearer
originalText: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)\nWhenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals combat damage to a player, that player gets two poison counters. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
flavorText: "Come, Koma, and reclaim what you lost! Or does the great serpent fear a rematch?"

name: Gnarlback Rhino
originalText: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)\nWhenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, draw a card.
flavorText: "The bad news is the siege wall is gone. The good news I've got ideas for a new battering ram."\n—Sergeant Ginnick

name: Heroes' Bane
originalText: This creature enters with four +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on this creature, where X is its power.
flavorText: Travelers' tales claim that hydras bite off their own heads to make themselves deadlier.

name: Mold Adder
originalText: Whenever an opponent casts a blue or black spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
flavorText: The more you struggle against its coils, the tighter they get.

name: Ordeal of Nylea
originalText: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice this Aura.\nWhen you sacrifice this Aura, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Predator Ooze
originalText: Indestructible (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature.)\nWhenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.\nWhenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

name: Primal Might
originalText: Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn. Then it fights up to one target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavorText: The shaman looked at the world through Ghalta's eyes and understood that everything else was his prey.

name: Primeval Bounty
originalText: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.\nWhenever you cast a noncreature spell, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.\nLandfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you gain 3 life.

name: Rampaging Baloths
originalText: Trample\nLandfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
flavorText: "When the land is angry, so are they."\n—Nissa Revane

name: Springbloom Druid
originalText: When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavorText: "New growth applies a healing poultice to wounds long scabbed over."

name: Surrak, the Hunt Caller
originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, target creature you control gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} no matter when it came under your control.)
flavorText: "The greatest honor is to feed Atarka."

name: Venom Connoisseur
originalText: Whenever another creature you control enters, this creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, all creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.

name: Vizier of the Menagerie
originalText: You may look at the top card of your library any time.\nYou may cast creature spells from the top of your library.\nYou can spend mana of any type to cast creature spells.

name: Wildborn Preserver
originalText: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nReach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nWhenever another non-Human creature you control enters, you may pay {X}. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on this creature.

name: Aurelia, the Warleader
originalText: Flying, vigilance, haste\nWhenever Aurelia attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
flavorText: Where Razia was aloof and untouchable, Aurelia is on the frontlines, calling for war.

name: Ayli, Eternal Pilgrim
originalText: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)\n{1}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.\n{1}{W}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Exile target nonland permanent. Activate only if you have at least 10 life more than your starting life total.

originalText: As this enchantment enters, choose Sultai or Abzan.\n• Sultai — Whenever a counter is put on a creature you control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.\n• Abzan — Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature. It gains menace until end of turn.

name: Rediscover the Way
originalText: I, II — Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.\nIII — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell this turn, target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

name: Revival of the Ancestors
originalText: I — Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens.\nII — Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures you control.\nIII — Creatures you control gain trample and lifelink until end of turn.

name: Roar of Endless Song
originalText: I, II — Create a 5/5 green Elephant creature token.\nIII — Double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.

name: Thunder of Unity
originalText: I — You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.\nII, III — Whenever a creature you control enters this turn, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

name: Windcrag Siege
originalText: As this enchantment enters, choose Mardu or Jeskai.\n• Mardu — If a creature attacking causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.\n• Jeskai — At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. It gains lifelink and haste until end of turn.

name: Cori Mountain Monastery
originalText: This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.\n{T}: Add {R}.\n{3}{R}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
flavorText: Come to learn. Stay to teach.

name: Dalkovan Encampment
originalText: This land enters tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.\n{T}: Add {W}.\n{2}{W}, {T}: Whenever you attack this turn, create two 1/1 red Warrior creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Great Arashin City
originalText: This land enters tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains.\n{T}: Add {B}.\n{1}{B}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token.

name: Kishla Village
originalText: This land enters tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.\n{T}: Add {G}.\n{3}{G}, {T}: Surveil 2.
flavorText: Silumgar's remnants drown, a new Sultai rises.

name: Mistrise Village
originalText: This land enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.\n{T}: Add {U}.\n{U}, {T}: The next spell you cast this turn can't be countered.
flavorText: There is always an influx of visiting Temur families when the geothermal vents are most active.

0: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain flying until your next turn.

0: Add {C}{C}{C}.

originalText: You may cast Dragon spells without paying their mana costs.
flavorText: Ugin and the dragonstorms of Tarkir are intrinsically linked. With his death they weakened. With his life they raged. But even the Spirit Dragon does not hold them fully under his sway.

name: Sarkhan, Dragon Ascendant
originalText: When Sarkhan enters, you may behold a Dragon. If you do, create a Treasure token.\nWhenever a Dragon you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Sarkhan. Until end of turn, Sarkhan becomes a Dragon in addition to its other types and gains flying.

name: Craterhoof Behemoth
originalText: Haste\nWhen this creature enters, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
flavorText: "Some days, you wish you were fighting an Eldrazi."\n—Ugin

name: All-Out Assault
originalText: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.\nWhen this enchantment enters, if it's your main phase, there is an additional combat phase after this phase followed by an additional main phase. When you next attack this turn, untap each creature you control.

name: Death Begets Life
originalText: Destroy all creatures and enchantments. Draw a card for each permanent destroyed this way.
flavorText: "Life ensures death. Death ensures life. Yet always I remain. Perhaps an abiding harvest needs an ageless shepherd."\n—Ugin

name: Narset, Jeskai Waymaster
originalText: At the beginning of your end step, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw cards equal to the number of spells you've cast this turn.
flavorText: With no dragonlord to hold her back, she was free to learn every secret Ugin left behind.

name: Skirmish Rhino
originalText: Trample\nWhen this creature enters, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

name: Static Snare

name: Roiling Dragonstorm
originalText: When this enchantment enters, draw two cards, then discard a card.\nWhen a Dragon you control enters, return this enchantment to its owner's hand.

name: Strategic Betrayal
originalText: Target opponent exiles a creature they control and their graveyard.
flavorText: As Sultai blades threatened Qatros city walls, Mehtma of House Fenzala turned her weapons on her political rivals.

name: Channeled Dragonfire
originalText: Channeled Dragonfire deals 2 damage to any target.\nHarmonize {5}{R}{R}

name: Encroaching Dragonstorm
originalText: When this enchantment enters, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.\nWhen a Dragon you control enters, return this enchantment to its owner's hand.

name: Temur Battlecrier
originalText: During your turn, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.
flavorText: When called to the land's defense, all come to protect their shared home. It's why many of the Temur use "family" and "herd" interchangeably.

name: Qarsi Revenant
originalText: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink\nRenew — {2}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a flying counter, a deathtouch counter, and a lifelink counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavorText: "Evil wears many faces. Keep your windows closed at night, or it might wear yours."\n—Sultai warning
